This game is broken! 

Developers make unreal epic content, but an unusual number of bugs in this game will shake its atmosphere. If you do not like yourself, and bought this game. I have 2 steps for you, how to feel good here.

1 step. Pinch your eyeballs by opening the gate. https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/423930080860045325/479359361286668319/Screenshot_1659.png

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/423930080860045325/479359384468717569/Screenshot_1651.png

Muy divertido mas si juegas de asesino, con premades es un abuso pero te lo pasas mejor, jugar solo de superviviente te puede dar cancer aveces, recomendado xd

dans le fond c'est tout de meme un bon jeu mais evidemment il y a des mais...deja sortir regulierement des dlc sur un jeu barder de bugs faut arreter...ensuite le probleme du jeu viens surtout du fait que c'est un jeu en coop si vous jouer avec des amis pas de soucis mais en pickup entre ceux qui decrochent devant le tueur juste pour faire leurs points ceux qui attendent sans faire les objectifs ceux qui campent la trappe que le reste de la team soit morte les tueurs avec de mauvaise connexions qui feront des jump qui facecamp ou encore qui cheat de plus ce jeu est tres mal recompenser combien de fois j'ai du faire la quasi totalit√© des generateurs solo ouvrir la porte pendant que les autres couraient comme des debiles pour au final marquer peux voir moins de points et si vous voulez jouer tueur cela peut etre encore pire en tombant sur une team qui des que vous attraperez quelqu'un vas bodyblock vous empechant de jouer en clair c'est un bon jeu ou vous aurez rarement des parties agreable........

Nach knapp 450 Spielstunden von einen eigentlich super Spiel wurde ich so oft von der toxischen Community wegen angeblichen Cheatens reported (nein, hatte ich nicht, ich hab sogar die meisten meiner Runden aufgezeichnet und auf youtube ver√∂ffentlicht), dass ich nicht mehr als Killer spielen kann. Danke Leute.
broken ass game. killers to overpowered  after new update. game never works anymore takes 1 hour to find match as killer. as surivor killers all have horrible connection. screw you devs.
i think we did a pretty good job so far

I wanted to refund this game.
I'm glad it was denied.
When you first start playing, as a killer, since that's what I main, the experience can be incredibly frustrating.
However, with time, patience and practice, you'll find that you can adapt to handle these otherwise frustrating situations.
With a wide range of characters to choose from, you are very likely to find a killer who suits your playstyle.
While some killers are clearly better than others, you at least get to add a little personality to the way you play, making the note so good killers a bit better in your hands.
Plenty of people will enjoy bullying and taunting your efforts, but with time, you'll have them running in fear.
Have patience with this game, and it'll soon be a fun experience.

fuck this game

pretty good job so farrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr!

Randoms and people with weak mentality are what make this game so frustating at times. Other than that, the game is fun, lots of bugs, won't lie, though is a game that you will probably enjoy if you are into the horror genre, like Friday 13th & etc. 1.1k hours playing and still having fun like I had in the first couple hours as a rank 20.

Really fun if you have your own team, play with your friends as survivors. I wish there will be option to 'push to talk' in game for survivors, for more enjoyable teamwork. 

The game is nice, easy to understand, variety styles to play. Unfortunately, sometimes ruined by toxic players, especially as killers.

Amazing game 10/10 recommend something about running away when the killer is hunting you really gets the blood going 
fun to play with friends to

So you get teamed up with some s h i t t y ppl once in a while. Adapt. Improvise. Overcome. 
But seriously chill out and do your best, and if you get too gotdamm triggered over it play as killer for a bit. 
Jeez.

Anyways, 10 out of 10 game. Got it recently on the PS+ monthly thing, love how far it's come along (haven't played since it the Halloween expansion) and got back in on PC. Been playing non stop since.

Es un muy buen juego, entretiene, engancha y tiene una gran variedad, AUNQUE claro solo puedes disfrutarlo si encuentras partida ¬¨¬¨
Es pesnoso el sistema de busqueda, no puede ser que esperes 20 o 30 minutos como asesino, y no se una ni el loro y se pone peor mientras vas avanzando rangos.
Y como superviviente encuentres partida en 5 min. ¬øComo se distribuyen a los usuarios al momento de buscar partida? Porque repito jugas como superviviente y en 5 min estas jugando, pero de asesino podes esperar la vida entera q no vas a jugar.
Fuera de eso el juego es muy bueno, casi no pose "bugs" y en tus primeras partidas te llevaras varios sustos o podras sentir esa emoci√≥n de caza. 
Es un juego competitivo por lo que mejoras con la practica y dedicacion
The game itself is amazing BUT the community is garbage. Just get it on console to mostly avoid that

its a really fun game, it has some bugs but its still a really good game.
the main thing is to finish gens and open a escape door.(this was for people reading these and trying to find if this is a good game( any ways i recommend this game!

***************************************************************************************************
THIS GAME LEFT ME NOTHING WORTH REMEMBER BUT PURE HATE TOWARD THE FUCKING THAILAND PLAYER!
***************************************************************************************************
i dont care what this comment will cost me, i have a ready mind.
TBH the game is pretty good, despite the killer have to be the host of server, and also ignore the fact you will be always playing with cheaters with full gear and super humen speed, and game credit booster, some player would not even dare to show their steam profile to hide the fact they actully unlock most achivment in a second, and you can meet VAC more often then any game, still a pretty good game i guess

I think the devoloper has to respond to players request more often, all the saving teamate for points and taunting killer with the flashlight is slowly killing this game, i started to pick up this game again and spend time in it for almost 2 week now and those two behavior mostly done by thailand player is making my intension to play drop from 100 to total 0. just 10 days and i already wanted to quit, i was crazy about it just days ago.

Thailand people are DIRT in this game, i ask anyone who saw this to watch out when you team up with them, or they will save you beside a killer and watch you die at last, playing in selfish way for their own points in game, or keep on taunting you with flash light and go total hostile to the killer with thier friend, that is when you are playing as the killer, you will have no more joy if 2 - 3 of them join you as surviver, they tease and as well insult nor try to piss you off for fun. that is their gaming culture and all you can do is avoid them or stop playing like me, unless the mighty devoloper will finaly do something about it. I hope they let players choose the server like i heard people said it was in the good old days

if you are looking to buy this game, i warn you here please dont. most of my time in this game is only pure upset and angry. it is not noob friendly! many vets player cheat on the matching system to lower their rank and allow them to play with noob, but with their highest level skills and equipment, they see you as pure blood point earning tool only, you are there only for their daily mission.   this game is DEAD to me. if you bought the whole DLC and you were just a noob like me, then i wish you would have the fun you were expecting at the beginning, and hope you are not hot tempered, cause im a usually clam person and this must be the first time i got so p-i-s-s-e-d on the net, after being played like a fool by higher lvl player and being taunt and challenge everyday i finaly lost my s-h-i-t- i admit that.   10 / 9 time i encounter a Thailand player as a surrvivor they will try their best to not just beat you in game(witch i am total okay with) but going further to show off and make you have suck gaming exprience, that is their gaming culture you can only avoid them in game or stop playing like me, am i a total f-u-c-k-i-n-g racist? yes i am after this game, they have change my impression of them. but you know what im telling is true indeed if you are currently playing, 

HERE IS MY ADVICE, PLAY WITH FRIEND ONLY. PRIVATE MATCH IS THE BEST WAY TO PLAY THIS GAME, IF YOU ARE ABOUT TO PLAY ALONE, GG.

to Thailand players, i been in thai for years, i know how you people are. you must feel very heroic and brave while taunting noob killer and while laughing at them during your steam. there is nothing here to stop you. but i hope game player from the globe will despite all of you one day, and i will do as much as i can to insult you people in other game.

I highly recommend this gaem it is very fun but difficult at first so stick to it. Although you might nit want to get it if you have nobody to play with because it is far better with friends and there is no voice chat.

Dead by daylight foi um jogo que me surpreendeu.
A primeira vista eu pensava que era um survivors vs assassin bem ruim e mon√≥tono mas mudei minha opini√£o.

O jogo √© complexo a primeira vista, mas basta algumas horas para se tornar bom nas partidas.
Diversidades de perks, tanto pra survivor quanto pra assassino. E diversos itens e oferends que deixam o jogo mais fren√©tico e/ou interessante.
Um ponto que n√£o achei bom foi o pre√ßo das DLC que cobram absurdos para liberar um assassino e sobrevivente apenas.

Fora isso, o jogo √© √≥timo. Principalmente com a ajuda dos amigos !

There is not much to be said about DBD that hasnt been said already. Two years down the road and many patches later DBD still is one of the best PVP games with straight forward objectives and expectations. The adrenaline is there..specialy for new players, the one thing you will remember is that adrenaline rush specialy when playing survivor. 

Another thing to note is that you dont need to spend aditional money, I purchased the game (18 euros) on release after playing in Beta andd I havent spent a dime since while missing out on some killers ( I dont usually play as killer much, and my trapper still does fine ). Value for money is high 1400h+ for 18 euros. 

I like how you are not forced to farm anything and all time spent is literraly fun ( nowadays after they fixedd the matchmaking which was a pain for a long time). Log in, queue, play. Its easy to get all necessary perks in relatively short time.
Playing with a friend or friends in SWF is even better and will gain higher and easier farm/ranking

This is a major Buy. You wont regret having this game in your Library

played this game on consoles 80+ hrs and now ive switched to PC
this game is really fun specially with your group party 
got to admit that the killer is OP in this game, but its insanely FUN and i like playing this game alot 
the horror theme stages and characters in this game are EPIC!

if you have a group you can play with, i'd recommend this game alot 
even if you play it alone sometimes its fun
